description.narrative: Duty bearers are responsive to the differential security needs of women and girls in conformity with the International and national policy and legal frameworks including the Liberia National Action Plan on Women Peace and Security for inclusive security.

activity-description.narrative: The project will cover beneficiaries in Bomi, Nimba, Grand Gedeh, Lofa, Maryland, Cape Mount and Montserrado Counties.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

comment.narrative: - 25 officials of security institutions, ministries and civil society organisations with skills, knowledge and tools to develop, implement and report on women, peace and security policy as well as other legal frameworks; - Two institutions with endorsed gender policies and implementation plans
